metadata.dc:author: Uscanga Chávez, Estela
Coronel-Brizio, Pedro
Guzmán García, Raúl
Noguera Martínez, José Luis
metadata.dc:description: Primary breast tuberculosis was diagnosed in a 47 year old female. The diagnosis was made based on result of histopathological examination of a tumor biopsy material. The The tumor was excised. Antituberculous therapy was begun. The authors discuss the Cooper A classification of mammary tuberculosis.
metadata.dc:title: Tuberculosis primaria de la mama.
[Primary breast tuberculosis].
